alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 10:13AM CST until February 22 at 7:30AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen For the Buttahatchie River...including Aberdeen...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Water is covering a portion of Air Base Road located on the west bank of the river. Low-lying farmland is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Saturday the stage was 14.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM CST Saturday was 14.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 14.4 feet this afternoon. It will then rise to 14.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will fall to 14.4 feet tomorrow morning. It will then rise to 14.9 feet early Monday afternoon. It will fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
